sql:
CREATE TABLE "categories" (
	"id" uuid PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"name" varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp DEFAULT now(),
	"updated_at" timestamp DEFAULT now(),
	CONSTRAINT "categories_name_unique" UNIQUE("name")
);

CREATE TABLE "check_items" (
	"id" uuid PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"category_id" uuid NOT NULL,
	"name" varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	"sort_position" integer NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp DEFAULT now(),
	"updated_at" timestamp DEFAULT now()
);

CREATE TABLE "task_checks" (
	"id" uuid PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"task_id" uuid NOT NULL,
	"check_item_id" uuid NOT NULL,
	"is_done" boolean DEFAULT false NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp DEFAULT now(),
	"updated_at" timestamp DEFAULT now()
);

CREATE TABLE "tasks" (
	"id" uuid PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"category_id" uuid NOT NULL,
	"name" varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	"status" "task_status" NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp DEFAULT now(),
	"updated_at" timestamp DEFAULT now()
);
ALTER TABLE "check_items" ADD CONSTRAINT "check_items_category_id_categories_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("category_id") REFERENCES "public"."categories"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "task_checks" ADD CONSTRAINT "task_checks_task_id_tasks_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("task_id") REFERENCES "public"."tasks"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "task_checks" ADD CONSTRAINT "task_checks_check_item_id_check_items_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("check_item_id") REFERENCES "public"."check_items"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "tasks" ADD CONSTRAINT "tasks_category_id_categories_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("category_id") REFERENCES "public"."categories"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "task_checks" ADD COLUMN "sort_position" integer NOT NULL;
